preparation: Pour milk into Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup over high heat; add teabags.
Using a large spoon, carefully squeeze tea bags against side of the pot. This helps release flavour and natural colour.
Bring to a boil, then remove from heat. Gently squeeze teabags one last time (careful not to break teabags!), then discard.
Pour into blender; add honey, cinnamon, and pepper blend. Blend for 30 sec, or until frothy.
Pour into mugs; sprinkle with more cinnamon and pepper blend, if desired.
